00013 static struct Mux_Struct* EncoderMux;

00020 void Encoder_Init(struct Mux_Struct* Mux){
00021         /*
00022          * array of pin for mux
00023          * p0.20 is not_EN
00024          * p0.16-p0.19 is selecting bits
00025          */
00026         int i;
00027 
00028 //      Mux_Init(EncoderMux,EN,gpio); //Init GPIO ##GPIO[4] EN, GPIO[3] MS --> GPIO[0] LS
00029         EncoderMux = Mux;
00030         SPI_InitMaster(16);
00031         for(i=MUX_ENCODER1 ; i<=MUX_ENCODER10 ;i++)
00032         {
00033                 Encoder_Reset(i);
00034         }
00035 }
00036 
00041 void Encoder_Reset(int channel){
00042         int i;
00043         int data;
00044 
00045         SPI_SetLength(8);//encoder use 32-bit mode, we use 4 times 8 bits sending to make it work
00046 
00047         /*
00048          *set the MDR0
00049          */
00050         Mux_Set(EncoderMux,channel);// select channel (low that pin)
00051 
00052         data = 0;
00053         data |= (1<<7) | (0<<6) | (0<<5) | (0<<4) | (1<<3);//;LS7366 WR_MDR0 command
00054 
00055         SPI_Send(data);
00056 
00057         data = 0;
00058         data |= (0<<7) |//Filter clock division factor = 1
00059                 (0<<6) |//Asynchronous Index
00060                 (0<<5) |//disable index
00061                 (0<<4) |//disable index
00062                 (0<<3) |//free-running count mode
00063                 (0<<2) |//free-running count mode
00064                 (1<<1) |//x4 quadrature count mode
00065                 (1<<0) ;//x4 quadrature count mode
00066 
00067         SPI_Send(data);
00068 
00069         Mux_Unset(EncoderMux);// select no pin(high all pin)
00070 
00071         for(i=0;i<100;i++){}//delay
00072 
00073         /*
00074          *  set the MDR1
00075          */
00076         Mux_Set(EncoderMux,channel);// select channel (low that pin)
00077 
00078         data = 0;
00079         data |= (0<<7) | (0<<6) | (0<<5) | (1<<4) | (0<<3);//;LS7366 CLR_MDR1 command
00080 
00081         SPI_Send(data);
00082 
00083         Mux_Unset(EncoderMux);// select no pin(high all pin)
00084 
00085         for(i=0;i<100;i++){}//delay
00086 
00087         /*
00088          *  set the CNTR
00089          */
00090         Mux_Set(EncoderMux,channel);// select channel (low that pin)
00091 
00092         data = 0;
00093         data |= (0<<7) | (0<<6) | (1<<5) | (0<<4) | (0<<3);//;LS7366 CLR_CNTR command
00094 
00095         SPI_Send(data);
00096 
00097         Mux_Unset(EncoderMux);// select no pin(high all pin)
00098 
00099         for(i=0;i<100;i++){}//delay
00100 }
00101 
00107 int Encoder_Read(int channel){
00108         int i,k;
00109         int data;
00110 
00111         SPI_SetLength(8);//encoder use 32-bit mode, we use 4 times 8 bits sending to make it work
00112         /*
00113          *  get value from LS7366R
00114          */
00115         Mux_Set(EncoderMux,channel);// select channel (low that pin)
00116 
00117         data = 0;
00118         data |= (0<<7) | (1<<6) | (1<<5) | (0<<4) | (0<<3);//;LS7366 RD_CNTR command
00119 
00120         SPI_Send(data);
00121 
00122         data=0;
00123         for(k=0;k<4;k++){
00124                 for (i=0;i<100;i++){}//delay
00125                 i=SPI_Send(1);//dummy send, receive data from LS7366;
00126                 data = (data<<8) + i;
00127         }
00128 
00129         Mux_Unset(EncoderMux);// select no pin(high all pin)
00130         return data;
00131 }
00132 
00136 void Encoder_ReadAll(){
00137         int i;
00138         for(i=MUX_ENCODER1 ; i<=MUX_ENCODER10 ;i++)
00139         {
00140                 encoder_value_[i] = Encoder_Read(i);
00141         }
00142 }
00148 int Encoder_ReadBuffer(int channel){
00149         return encoder_value_[channel];
00150 }
